metadata.title: CVE-2020-9308 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: archive_read_support_format_rar5.c in libarchive before 3.4.2 attempts tounpack a RAR5 file with an invalid or corrupted header (such as a headersize of zero), leading to a SIGSEGV or possibly unspecified other impact.

criterions.comment: libarchive: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
